casebody.data:
NO. 2018-CC-0363 Supreme Court of Louisiana. March 9, 2018

Maria MORALES-AMAYA, Heide Montoya-Corrales, Norma Montoya-Corrales, Alejandra Montoya-Corales, Santos Cordero, and Herlinda Marquez, Yolanda Hernandez, Lucio Hernandez, Israel Hernandez and Lee Roy Hernandez
v.
Damien E. ROBINSON, D & P Robinson Trucking, LLC, Praetorian Insurance Company, JKL Transportation Company and XYZ Insurance Company

Stay denied. Writ denied.
